name: Scott Anderson
text: It's a commercial pizza place so I dont have very high expectations.  The food is what I have come to expect from them after all these years.  That is a good thing from a consistency standpoint but also bad from a variety standpoint. Time for a shakeup guys, let's see some menu changes and focus on quality

name: Sean Salisbury
text: I stopped by there last week because I had a craving for cheese breadsticks. They warned me that they had a couple huge orders ahead of me and that it could take like 30 minutes to get my food. I was headed home after a long day so I didn't ‚Ä¶More

name: Gordon Whittemore
text: Stopped with my wife after a meeting we had a $7.99 Large meatball pizza the pizza was excellent took a couple pieces Home Phone my son great quick lunch

name: autumn Hackett
text: First time at this pizza hut, went in for something quick, and quick it was, also not expensive. Guy at order counter was friendly. Food came as desired. Quiet and not busy, when we had gone to the Saco Pizza Hut we always waited forever even if it was empty. A place we will visit again.

text: I order from Pizza Hut once a month for a youth program pizza party. They are always on time and are very friendly.

text: This is the most expensive pizza hut I have ever been to . 2 1 topping pizzas and 4 sodas $45.00. The manager was rude and the pizza was made very poorly. I wish you could no star a place
